location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Justin Sheil, HM Minister Plenipotentiary and Envoy Extraordinary at the Court of Persia, Tehran to Lieutenant Colonel Samuel Hennell, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is requesting a condensed statement on the modes of taxation being levied in Fars province; it is explained that the British Envoy is making this request as a result of an intention by the Ameer-i-Nizam [Amir-i-Nizam] to raise the assessment of taxes throughout the Kingdom.
